bodyText.text: In a moment you will be taking the final scored assessment covering the material from all the lessons of this course. This is the time to go back and review the course content before you begin the assessment.

Course Level 22 In a moment you will be taking the final scored assessment covering the material from all the lessons of this course. This is the time to go back and review the course content before you begin the assessment.
In order to receive CPE credit, you must score a
% or higher on the final assessment.

body.instructionText: Click Start to take the final assessment and see how much you have learned.

PassText.CongtateText:
Congratulations! You have successfully completed this assessment and will receive CPE credit.
Your assessment results are shown below.
PassText.InstructionText: Click on the EXIT button to exit this course and return to the main menu.

FailText.FailSubTitle:
Your score is not sufficient to earn you CPE credit points.
Your assessment results are shown below.

Retake.RetakeInstructionText: Click Retake Assessment to reattempt the assessment, or click Exit to exit this course and return to the main menu.

transcripts.transcript: This concludes the KPMG Learning course, “Hedge Accounting”. To receive CPE credit, please proceed to the final exam.
